name: Solitaire Minute
description:
"What an addictive game!", "I cannot stop playing this game!!", "Download this game now!", "Must have app", "Very intriguing game!" ... thank you for the rave reviews!

Skull Island awaits with 30 levels of solitaire puzzles to challenge your mind and fingers!

Gameplay is based on TriPeaks Solitaire where you play a card one higher or one lower than the card (and Aces play to Kings, Kings play to Aces) but the timer takes the game to a whole new level of fun!

- 30 solitaire puzzles!
- wild card, more keys, and easier keys power ups!
- earn stars on every level!
- Addictive gameplay, we can’t put it down ourselves!
